prompts: Create a small aquatic Pokemon with a sleek body and playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, featuring blue and gray colors.
Design a cute, serpentine Pokemon that loves to swim and explore its environment.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a fish but has unique features like whiskers.
Generate an adorable water-type Pokemon with a streamlined shape and vibrant fins.
Make a Pokemon that is both a water and ground type, perfect for muddy habitats.
Give me a Pokemon that can blend into its watery surroundings with a smooth color palette.
